item.title: Five Asian hotels are ranked in the top 25 of Expedia Insiders' Select 2014
item.description:
Expedia unveiled its 2014 Insiders’ Select list in early July. This list highlights the best hotels globally, as determined by almost two million verified customer reviews and Expedia’s own travel experts. Source: Blue Karma Resort website. Out of over 290,000 bookable properties on Expedia’s global websites, 650 hotels received the Insiders’ Select designation in 2014. Here are a few of the top 25 hotels from this year’s list: 2. Blue Karma ResortÂ - Seminyak, Bali..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/five-asian-hotels-are-ranked-in-the-top-25-of-expedia-insiders-select-2014/
